marklogic.body: I just got back from taking my 82 year old mother to the airport. We have full body scanners here now. She couldn't raise her right arm above her head fully to get a proper scan because her shoulder is shot. So, out of line and into the regular walk through scanner. She has hip replacements, so that set Off that scanner and then she was left left standing in one Spot for about 10 minutes. Just made me mad to see her standing there like cattle. There has to be a better way.
